description: To address the issue outlined in CVE-2023-5487 affecting Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based), users should ensure they are running version 118.0.2088.46 or higher. This update resolves an inappropriate implementation in fullscreen mode within the browser. For best practices, you can verify your current version by clicking on the three dots in the upper-right corner and selecting 'Help and Feedback', then 'About Microsoft Edge'. Keeping your software up to date is essential for mitigating potential risks. The update is documented under the KB article ID KB-118.0.2088.46.
